CHAOS in Vietnam Today! Typhoon Bualoi Hits Cities, 240 km/h Gusts Destroy Homes, 580.000 Evacuated

typhoonbualoi #typhoonvietnam #vietnamtyphoon On September 28, 2025, the typhoon Bualoi crisis intensified as the powerful ...

I was just in Da Nang on the 26th and left Hanoi to fly back to the UK yesterday. I feel very lucky to have left when I did. My heart breaks for the Vietnamese. I hope they can rebuild the coast and get back to normality as soon as possible!
Hindi
The wrath of God upon Vietnam. The people need to repent.
Stay strong ❤ Vietnam, your resilience will shine after this nightmare.
So scary 😱 the storm wiped out entire streets in hours.
This storm proves climate change is no longer theory—it’s here. Stronger, deadlier typhoons are becoming the new normal 🌍
The images of collapsed buildings and twisted cars show how unprepared cities are for storms this strong 🌪
So heartbreaking 💔 half a million evacuees left with nothing.
Unreal 😳 whole streets flattened like they never existed.
Stay strong ❤ Vietnam, your resilience will shine through this nightmare.
It’s not just destruction—it’s trauma. Parents trying to be strong while knowing they lost everything in just one night 💔
Prayers 🙏 for Vietnam, may everyone find safety and strength.
The images of families carrying children through waist-deep water broke my heart. That fear and helplessness will stay with them forever.
Typhoon Bualoi tearing through Vietnamese cities with 240 km/h winds is unimaginable. Entire neighborhoods gone, 580,000 people forced to flee in chaos 💔
God is merciful
Respect to the rescue teams working in such extreme conditions. Heroes in the storm
the scale of evacuation is staggering. Vietnam’s resilience is strong, but recovery will take years.
damn entire districts flattened 😳
bro cars floating like toy boats 🚗🌊
the sound of wind howling like jet engines is terrifying. It shows how powerless we are when nature unleashes its fury.
sending prayers to Vietnam 🙏
seeing 580,000 evacuated shows how massive this storm is. Still, so many lost everything in just hours.
damn houses flattened like paper 💥
wtf whole neighborhoods underwater 🌊
Vietnam looks devastated—roofs ripped away, streets underwater, and families running for their lives. The destruction from Typhoon Bualoi is heartbreaking 💔

👨🏻  Nowadays, the five elements are moving, the sun and the moon are changing. Buddha has guided the filter of good people who know how to practice to restore the ancient times, and destroy evil people. This is the final period, when Heaven opens the door for people who know how to practice, repent and return to God. In the final period of filtering, those who do not know how to practice should not blame Heaven and Buddha…🙏
36 people died so far
ベトナムに何の恨みがあるの　やめなさい
Bualoi left behind silence, debris, and pain 😢 but also the strength to rebuild 🌍
Vietnam will rise again 💪 storms can crush walls but not hope ❤🙏
Prayers for survivors 🙏 may healing come faster than the destruction did ❤
Streets once full of laughter now echo only with rushing water 🌊💔
The trauma of losing everything in a night will never leave people’s hearts 💔
The night sky flashing with broken power lines looked like an apocalypse 💥
580,000 people forced to leave overnight 😨 where do you even house that many evacuees?
Rescue workers carrying elders on their backs deserve the world’s respect 💪❤
Recovery will take years 💔 scars of Bualoi will remain for generations 🌍
The destruction looked like war, but it came from wind and water 🌪🌊 not bombs
Stay safe Vietnam ❤ storms can flatten cities but never the human spirit 🙏
Roads ripped apart mean entire towns cut off 🚑 people stranded waiting for help
Bualoi’s fury proves that climate change is fueling deadlier storms 🌡 when will we act?
Families huddled in the dark while the storm howled outside 😢 unimaginable fear
Even rescue boats looked small against the power of the flood 🌊 a frightening sight 😨
Children clinging to their parents in chest-deep water broke my heart 💔😭
This is not just destruction, it’s trauma that will haunt survivors for years 💔
Prayers for Vietnam 🙏 the world is with you in this dark time ❤
Aid must arrive quickly 🚑 families can’t wait weeks for food and clean water 🙏
I can’t imagine losing my entire house in minutes 😢 what would you save if you had only five minutes?
Storm surges turned towns into oceans 🌊 entire communities erased in moments 💥
Masbate had Opong, Fujian had Ragasa, and now Vietnam with Bualoi 🌍 Asia is suffering storm after storm 💔
The skyline changed forever 🌪 homes gone, bridges collapsed, roads buried in water
Families clutching kids and pets running barefoot through floods is unforgettable 💔😭
Even hospitals and schools were destroyed 🌪 the places meant to protect people couldn’t withstand it 😨
Prayers for the children 🙏 may they heal from fear and return to laughter soon ❤
Bualoi didn’t just break homes, it broke generations of memories 💔
The coastline swallowed by waves looked like the sea moved inland 🌊💔 terrifying to watch
580,000 displaced means half a million new struggles for food, shelter, and medicine 😢
Stay strong Vietnam ❤ resilience is stronger than any storm 🌍
The roar of the wind was deafening 😨 survivors will remember that sound for life
Rescue workers risking everything in raging floods are heroes 💪🚑 risking lives to save strangers 🙏
Even concrete homes crumbled under Bualoi’s fury 🌪 nothing seemed strong enough to resist
Children crying in shelters broke me 💔 no child should face trauma this young 😢
Streets turned into rivers 🌊 cars floating, houses gone, everything changed in hours
